I'm A Front-End Developer

I practice The Art of Getting Your Shit Done while building kickass web apps, websites, and products.

My Wheelhouse

Cutting Edge Technology

Whether it's stable, cutting edge technology in client work or experimental, bleeding edge technology in personal projects, I'm constantly reading about, learning, contrinbuting to, and implementing the most modern technologies.

Lean UX & Product Development

A Front-End Developers job of aligning interface and business needs is never done.

"Lean UX unites product development and business, through constant measurement and so called “learning loops” (build – measure – learn)."

Marcin Treder, CEO UXPin

Scalability, From Code-To-Product

From modern scaffolding tools to intuitive interface design, I build products and apps that scale to the needs of the user, as well as future developers.

Customer Validation

From startups to corporations, knowing your customer is the first step to any successful app or product. Once you've validated your customer, you can build a successful web app, website, or product.

Current Projects

WriteOn

Currently in Private Beta, WriteOn was built by my business partner and me, also known as Beard & Fedora, as a passion project. WriteOn is a clean, minimalistic writing tool built for authors.

Sign Up For Private Beta

Beard & Fedora

A few years ago, in a detached garage in Downtown St. Pete, a business partnership came to fruition between two best friends. Since then, we've built a startup accelerator for misfits, a LeanUX toolset, a distributed software development team, a full front end development stack, WriteOn, and more. We travel together, write togehter, and build things to change the world together.

Check It Out On Github

A Beard Across America

A Beard Across America is a passion project inspired by my trip across America at the end of 2013. The project incorporates everything in my wheelhouse, including product development, scalability, and customer validation.

Check Out #ABAA
